title: i just lost a diamond promo game due to API servers on EUW making me and 2 others to dc
body: is this game gonna count as a loss? says so in client but it shouldnt count due to the RIOT servers losing me the game

replies.body: I don't suppose this happened around 11 PM - 1AM last night did it? I was playing a couple of games with some friends and we were randomly cut off as well, and we all live in different locations. I'd say it would be more to do with an odd server hiccup more than anything else, as I have been getting random DC's every once in a while as of late.

I'm really not sure how API would cause you and your friend to disconnect from the game server.  Whatever you went through sounds really frustrating, and I'm sorry it happened.  Are you guys on the same network or ISP?  If something is going on, I'd certainly like to help, but will need more specifics and info here.  Let me know what happened.

turns out we just got ddosed 2 games in a row by the same player. Shows 36 ping in game then it lags for 5 secs and delays then we just randomly dc. happened 4 times both games minimum. between the games our net worked fine and we even waited 10mins to queue in case it was our net, but still got macthed with him again, (playing with my brohter in the same house)
also happened to rammus (random teamate) in the first game, he described it the same way as we in after lobby
is my promo legit gonna be 1-2 after this or is it some way to fix it? this is not even close to being fair, i lose 2 games in the promo while the ddoser just won 35-40lp ich
Man , how Many times , i will have to tell you that i was bot " hacking you " i did 3 games before and 2 games After and nobody had this problem, check your network pls .

I happened to actually just play with that guy, nobody disconnected or lagged out at all.

You probably just experienced some other problem causing you to disconnect.

EDIT: Pretty crazy coincidence that I just played with him tho like damn!
